snippet.title: Beef Cat Ultra - Launch Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Beef Cat Ultra releases on Steam: September 23rd, 2024! 

Play the demo today on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2796510/Beef_Cat_Ultra/

------

In the quaint, happy world of Beeflandia - our hero, Beef Cat, and friends always found ways to celebrate good times. The vibes certainly changed, however, when Some Big Guy showed up and started causing a ruckus.

Beef Cat Ultra is a tough auto-battler in the Survivors genre. It blends linear hand-crafted stages across several gameplay styles with the looting and build-crafting of a roguelike without *most of the RNG. Every stage is tailor made to push you into a new comfort zone. Several modes across 4 visually distinct worlds with 6 unique playable characters and dozens of unique loot items to find mean endless variety around every corner in Beeflandia.
